sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Queen Elizabeth II's heir, Charles III, is officially proclaimed King of the United Kingdom by the Garter of Arms at St. James's Palace in London.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Officials and members of the public around the world pay their respects to Queen Elizabeth II and reflect on her 70-year reign.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's foreign ministry says defending troops have regained key cities on the Eastern Front line following more claims of advances south of Kharkiv. Sweden gets ready to hold a general election on Sunday but the latest polls but left and right blocks neck-and-neck with only a few seats between them. That my whole life, whether it be long or short, shall be devoted to your service and to the service of our great imperial family.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: God save the King!

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Charles III has been proclaimed the new King of the United Kingdom and 14 other Commonwealth realms by the Garter of Arms at St. James' Palace in London.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: State trumpeters played the national anthem after the principal proclamation was read from the balcony above the Friary Court.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Some 4.5 kilometres east, 62 guns were fired by the King's troops at the Tower of London to mark the monarch's accession.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: This comes as the new King thanked his mother, Queen Elizabeth II, in a throne room address and emphasised his duty as sovereign. I am deeply aware of this great inheritance and of the duties and heavy responsibilities of sovereignty which have now passed to me.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In taking up these responsibilities, I shall strive to follow the inspiring example I have been set in upholding constitutional government and to seek the peace, harmony and prosperity of the peoples of these islands and of the Commonwealth's realms and territories throughout the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: After paying tribute to his wife Camilla, he signed an oath in front of the Privy Council.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: His eldest son, Prince William, now first in line to the throne, also added his signature before Scotland's Prime Minister, Nicola Sturgeon, and the newly appointed Liz Truss signed the declaration.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The crowds that gathered here near St James' Palace were witnesses of yet another moment in history, a ceremony from the past that brought about the future.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Archaic language was used to proclaim Charles III the new monarch of England in a ceremony that lasted about 10 minutes, 10 minutes, that brought to an end 70 years of the former reign.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: And in his first words as king, Charles honored the memory of his mother and praised the selfless service Queen Elizabeth II delivered to this country in those seven decades, vowing to carry on her commitment to the job. A ceremony really extraordinary the very first time this council meets since 1952 and the very first time ever such a ceremony is broadcast live on TV. Prince William Queen Camilla current members of the government and former prime ministers were all in attendance of this. That is the first proclamation in a wave of proclamations scheduled to take place across the country through Sunday. Anneliese Borges in London for Euronews.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Tributes have been pouring in from around the world following the death of Britain's longest-serving monarch Queen Elizabeth II. Italian President Sergio Mattarella has signed a book of condolences at the British ambassador's residence in Rome. The 81-year-old wrote she inspired by wisdom and example entire generations of world citizens. France's former president Francois Hollande and his wife actress Julie Gaillet also paid their respects to the late Queen at the British Embassy in Paris. Elizabeth died at the age of 96 on Thursday and visited France more than any other country during her reign.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile in the southern hemisphere, Australia's Governor General David Hurley and Prime Minister Anthony Albanese joined diplomats and other leaders for a ceremony at the Queen's Terrace in Canberra.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Members of the public have left flowers at the gates of Sydney's Government House house while supporters of the monarchy in Brisbane have also been paying their respects.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: She was a very hard-working, respectful woman. It's great to see a woman who's been so dedicated to her role, meant so much to so many people globally.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Moving west to India, students from Gurukul Art School were seen creating vibrant portraits of the Queen on Friday at the edge of a busy street at the financial capital, Mumbai. Elizabeth II's funeral will be held in London's Westminster Abbey in approximately 10 days' time before she is buried at Windsor Castle.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian soldiers in the northeast of the country claim they've made major gains as their counter-offensive against Russian troops continues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: UK intelligence says defending forces have taken the Kremlin by surprise and have seized the key city of Kupensk, cutting off Moscow's supply route to Izum.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: While Ukraine makes progress on the front line, Kharkiv is reeling after Russian missiles injured 14 people, including three children, on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: However, a spokesperson for the armed forces says that Zelensky's military has retaken 30 settlements in the region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, in the liberated territories, the de-occupied communities are coming back to life, he says.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The demining of the area is underway.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Units of the National Guard are conducting stabilisation measures. The work of the National Police has resumed. And the police are recording numerous crimes committed by the enemy on Ukrainian soil. This comes as the Deputy Minister of Information in Donetsk took to Telegram and wrote Russian troops have deserted Izum.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: However, the Russian Ministry of Defence has released footage of a crew allegedly using howitzers with a range of 30 kilometers to destroy Ukrainian armored vehicles.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Sweden's political party leaders have now had their final debate ahead of Sunday's general election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: And the main topics on the table important to voters were energy prices, climate, healthcare, education and crime. There are two major blocs vying for a majority, the left and right, with four parties on each side. According to recent opinion polls, there are only a few seats between them. For now it could go either way. The current minority government is led by the left-wing Social Democrats.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Magdalena Andersson is prime minister, Sweden's first female prime minister, and she's fighting to stay at the helm of this group.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: However, a right-wing coalition is possible and would include the Liberals, Moderates, Christian Democrats and the far-right Sweden Democrats who have gained some popularity bringing immigration into the political debate.

sentences.sentence: and you've probably never heard of her.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But the self-taught aboriginal painter who died in 2015 is now considered one of Australia's great contemporary artists.

sentences.sentence: The Albertina houses one of Europe's most important compilations of modernist art, in the form of the Herbert Batliner Collection.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: A lawyer from Liechtenstein who passed away in 2019, one of the greatest art collectors and patrons of our time, the collection comprises more than 500 pieces covering virtually every aspect of modernist painting, including Russian avant-garde and surrealism, a must-see if you're in Vienna.
